hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd $WORKSPACE echo "###### build openGauss-tools-backup ######"
# deps # yum install java-1.8.0-openjdk java-1.8.0-openjdk-devel -y
latest_jdbc_pkg_version=3.0.0 latest_jdbc_pkg_url="https://opengauss.obs.cn-south-1.myhuaweicloud.com/latest/x86/openGauss-${latest_jdbc_pkg_version}-JDBC.tar.gz"
time=`date "+%Y%m%d%H%M%S"` echo "###### build time: $time "
## download the latest jdbc.jar if [ -d "$WORKSPACE/jdbc_jar" ]; then rm -rf "$WORKSPACE/jdbc_jar" fi mkdir "$WORKSPACE/jdbc_jar" cd "$WORKSPACE/jdbc_jar"
wget ${latest_jdbc_pkg_url} tar -zxf "openGauss-${latest_jdbc_pkg_version}-JDBC.tar.gz" rm -rf "openGauss-${latest_jdbc_pkg_version}-JDBC.tar.gz"
cd "$WORKSPACE/openGauss-tools-backup"
if [ -d ./lib/ ]; then rm -rf ./lib/ fi if [ -d ./bin/ ]; then rm -rf ./bin/ fi
mkdir ./lib/ ./bin/
cp "$WORKSPACE/jdbc_jar/postgresql.jar" ./lib/
if [ -f ./MANIFEST.MF ]; then rm -rf ./MANIFEST.MF fi touch MANIFEST.MF echo "Manifest-version: 1.0" >> MANIFEST.MF echo "Main-Class: jdbcgsbackup.JdbcGsBackup" >> MANIFEST.MF echo "Class-Path: lib/postgresql.jar" >> MANIFEST.MF echo "" >> MANIFEST.MF # openGauss-tools-backup.tar.gz # \openGauss-tools-backup.jar # \lib\postgresq.jar
cd ./src/ javac -cp ":$WORKSPACE/openGauss-tools-backup/lib/postgresql.jar" -d ../bin ./jdbcgsbackup/*.java cd .. jar cvfm openGauss-tools-backup.jar MANIFEST.MF -C bin .
package_name=openGauss-tools-backup if [ -d ./openGauss-tools-backup ]; then rm -rf ./openGauss-tools-backup fi mkdir -p ./openGauss-tools-backup mv openGauss-tools-backup.jar ./openGauss-tools-backup mv lib ./openGauss-tools-backup tar -zcvf openGauss-tools-backup.tar.gz ./openGauss-tools-backup
if [ -f "$WORKSPACE/openGauss-tools-backup/openGauss-tools-backup.tar.gz" ]; then echo "### start to upload openGauss-tools-backup.tar.gz to OBS ###" sh /var/jenkins_home/jdbcbackup_upload.sh "$WORKSPACE/openGauss-tools-backup/" fi
echo "build task end."
